snippet: Mitt Romney’s lack of full disclosure of his finances keeps voters from seeing the breadth of his tax avoidance.
abstract: Editorial contends that Mitt Romney's lack of full disclosure of his finances flies in the face of tradition and keeps voters from seeing the breadth of his tax avoidance; urges Romney to release many more of his tax returns.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s lack of full disclosure of his finances keeps voters from seeing the breadth of his tax avoidance.
